summary:
Management is like running and organizing different types of groups, such as businesses, non-profit organizations, or government bodies. It involves managing resources effectively. In big organizations, managers are often structured in a pyramid with three levels. 

You can study management at college in areas like Business Administration or Public Administration. Scientists also research management as a subject, looking at how organizations work and lead. Recently, there's been a push for "evidence-based management," using facts and research to make decisions.
title: Management
